name: Handmade 100% Natural Thai Bamboo Sticky Rice “Electric Cooker Steamer Set”, Small Pot Insert ~ 6.5 Inch, Hewn Reed Wicker Woven Lid, 16’’ Cheesecloth Filter, and Wooden Spoon
short_description: 🌱 ECO-FRIENDLY: 100% natural bamboo and is also 100% food safe. The authentic Thai chef sticky rice bamboo pot insert for your electric rice cooker to produce perfect up country sticky rice. Having the right equipment for the job is absolutely imperative for creating the renown jasmine rice texture and aroma for authentic Thai cuisine. 🌱 PERFECT YOUR RECIPE: Bring out fresh new flavors from a tired and true, multi-purpose steamer basket and woven wicker lid and our new sticky rice preparation accessories set. 🌱 HAND WOVEN: Individually handcrafted and designed to allow the steamed rice or dumplings to maximize the release the starch, which makes it sticky, while it soaks in the natural fragrance of the bamboo basket material. Consequently, it’s intended to be a pass down item for the younger generations of chefs in the family. 🌱 CONTENTS & SIZE: ~6.5 inch diameter by ~5.0 inch height with 16 inch round filter wrap, genuine restaurant quality bamboo woven lid, and classic style wooden spoon that you will only find in the most traditional Thai village kitchens. Dimensions vary ever so slightly as these beautiful baskets are all handmade. 🌱 EASY CARE, SIMPLE TO CLEAN: Rinse with water and these beautiful decor baskets are quick to air dry in the sunlight. This is not just another basket. It’s both a prep basket and a serving basket with old school design in both form and function. Makes any ordinary electric rice cooker, extraordinarily capable!

name: 304 Stainless Steel Microporous Colander,2QT Large Capacity with Mixing Bowl For washing vegetables, fruit and rice and for draining cooked pasta(2PC)
short_description: Colander is made of 304 food grade material, which is safe, healthy and durable. Drainage hole is 2mm in diameter, rice/bean/lentil will not overflow. Filter pore size of the microporous colander is 2 mm, which is suitable for cleaning most grain varieties. The colander is densely opened as a whole, and the holes are uniform, which can quickly drain the water. Mixing bowl is also made of 304 food bowl grade stainless steel. The inner wall adopts mirror polishing technology, which is smooth and bright.Mixing bowl is also made of 304 food bowl grade stainless steel. The inner wall adopts mirror polishing technology, which is smooth and bright. Mixing bowl and colander are both 8.65 inches in diameter and 3 inches high. Holds 2 quart items. The combination of the two makes it easy to clean and prepare food, making it an indispensable tool in your kitchen. If you are not satisfied with our bowls, please contact us and we will solve the problem for you as your satisfaction is our top priority. We will respond to any queries within 12 hours.

name: Sticky Rice Steamer Pot and Basket
short_description: A premium quality aluminum sticky rice steaming pot, imported from Thailand, made by the very best manufacturer -- Diamond Brand The pot is just the right size for American stovetops, allowing you to make a generous portion suitable for large parties or just a few handfulls It stands 8" tall and approx 7.5" across A premium quality sticky rice steaming basket, imported from Thailand, handwoven from beautiful natural reeds and sewn across the top. Will last for years 100% Natural Wooden Basket
product_description: Thai Lao Streaming Sticky Rice Cookware Thai Food Menu Recipe Kitchen Tool. This Cookware design by the ancient Know how and still be the best way to cook Sticky Rice (Kao-Neaw). The set you will got 1 Weaving Bamboo ware with 1 Aluminum Pot. The Method to cook is soak the Sticky Rice over night and then put into the Bamboo ware find something cover on the top put on the Aluminum Pot with water and cook on the medium Heat to streaming , When the Sticky Rice coming softer and near cook well Stir it to make the all rice heated. You may Apply this cookware to other streaming Menu to... it 's work.. capacity 8 liters

short_description: Safe and Reusable Material: Crafted from reusable plastic, the steamer is built to withstand high temperatures without warping. name: Sticky Rice Steamer Wicker Basket - Large
short_description: Natural Material: Crafted from premium bamboo wood, this steaming basket provides a natural way to cook sticky rice and other foods. Large Capacity: Measuring 12 inches in diameter, the spacious basket can hold up to 10 servings of cooked rice or other ingredients for family meals and gatherings. Durable Design: With sturdy interwoven bamboo strips forming its structure, the basket can withstand high-heat cooking and long-term use without warping or cracking. Easy Cleaning: Its open weave construction allows steam to circulate freely while keeping foods separate from boiling water below for quick rinsing after cooking. Versatile Cooking: Not just for steaming rice, the basket is also well-suited for cooking dumplings, vegetables, seafood and more, adding natural flavor with each use.
product_description: This large bamboo basket is perfect for steaming sticky rice and other foods. Crafted from durable bamboo strips, it conducts heat well allowing foods to steam evenly. Its spacious interior accommodates generous portions to feed the whole family. The wooden handles stay cool to the touch so the basket is easy to lift in and out of the steamer. A traditional cooking vessel, this basket infuses foods with a subtle bamboo aroma. Its natural material and simple design make it a stylish addition to any kitchen counter or dining table. Hand wash only with mild soap and dry thoroughly after each use to prolong the life of this heirloom-quality cooking tool. This is a staple cooking basket used in Thailand.

name: MacaRio Bamboo Steamer Basket Set 10 inch Steamer for Cooking, with Side Handles Chopsticks Ceramic Sauce Dishes Paper Liners, for Dim Sum Dumplings Buns Seafoods Rice Asian Foods
short_description: Handmade: Made of natural bamboo. It is nature friendly and safe to use All-In-One: Two tier baskets with a domed lid, four sets chopsticks, two sauce dishes and fifty paper liners Upgraded Version: Side handles for convenience and safety. reinforced with aluminum banding edges Versatile Usage: A good choice for cooking, warming and serving dim-sum, dumplings, buns, vegetables, seefoods, meat, rice and etc Healthier Cooking: Steaming is a healthier cooking method compared to simmering, frying, boiling or poaching. It helps to preserve the original flavor and nutrition of foods

name: Consevisen Vegetable Steamer Basket for Cooking Food, Stainless Steel Veggie Steam Basket for Pot, Folding Expandable Steaming Insert with Extendable Handle Fits Various Size Pot, 5.1" to 9"
short_description: Healthier cooking choices: The steamer basket with high quality stainless steel petals, food grade plastic handle and silicone feet will promote your health. It is non-rust, scratch proof and corrosion resistant, easy to clean for long use. Steaming is a healthy cooking choice because it helps retain more than 90% of the nutrients lost when either boiling or microwaving food. The foldable steam basket can be used to steam veggies, seafood, eggs, meats, desserts, baby food and much more Expandable and collapsible: Vegetable steamer basket collapsed diameter is 5.1 inches. It expands to 9 inches once petals are stretched out. The "wings" that fold in and out allow the steaming basket fit various pot/pan sizes or pressure cooker, turning any pan into a steamer. This steamer for cooking opens like a water lily and it folds compactly to save storage space Foldable, heat-resistant: 3 foldable legs with silicone will not scratch your pot, and prevent slip when place on counter tops. They are 1.2 inch in length to keep food above boiling water. You can pour more water in the pot and check the water level less often. When the steamer for cooking is not in use, the legs can be folded flat. The veggie steamer can withstands temperature so you do not worry about melting. The holes on petals are for easy steaming and draining Telescoping removable center post: The handle can be retracted so it doesn’t interfere with pot lid. It is extendable and long enough to help easy insertion to the deep pots. It is safe to remove the steamer basket from the boiling water. It is designed with a hole on the top of handle, so you can use a fork to remove the steamer basket for pot, keeping your hands away from hot steam. The handle is also removable to steam large items like corn on the cob Multiple functions: Not only can it be used as a food steamer basket, but also can be used as a strainer or fruit container. You can also use it to filter extra water when making salad. From busy moms to college students to culinary artist, this product is a definitely a must have for anyone who wants to get more health into their diet. It comes in a idea sized box makes it an awesome gift for your family & friends. We are here to assist you with any questions or problems you may have
product_description: STEAMING IS A HEALTHY & FAST WAY TO PREPARE MEALS. Thanks to this Stainless Steel Steamer Basket. It's Ideal for making delicious meals and steaming food without losing nutrient. Weight: 0.66LB Packaging box: L 5.9" x H 2.7" x W 5.9" Steamer Basket Size: Collapsed Diameter is 5.1" . Expandable to 9" Some benefits of this steamer basket include: - High quality food grade material . - Made of 18 panels can steam variety of foods. - Steam Foods preserves flavor and nutrients. - Collapsible design for easy compact storage. - Expands and adjusts to various pots, pans or pressure cooker. - REMOVABLE central handle for steaming of larger food. - 3 legs at the bottom keep food separate from the pot. - Lift it from the boiling water with a fork. - MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS : It can be used as container or candy plate. - EASY TO USE: Simply place the basket, feet side down. - Dishwasher safe making it easy and faster to clean. A great gift for women, men and everyone! Buy one as a gift for your family or friends! They will love perfectly steamed veggies!

name: GABUR Thai Sticky Rice Steamer (Basket Only) by Inspirepossible
product_description: After many years of anticipation, the Wok Shop has finally been able to import this wonderful rice steamer from Thailand. The hand-woven bamboo basket sits in the aluminum rice pot to create perfect aromatic Thai jasmine sticky (sweet) rice. No other steaming method creates sticky rice like this authentic set. Pot Ð 10" dia., 8.5" ht. Basket Ð 10" ht. x 10" x 14.5."

name: Aroma Housewares 6-Cup (Cooked) (3-Cup Uncooked) Pot Style Rice Cooker and Food Steamer (ARC-743-1NG), White
short_description: Perfectly prepares 2 to 6 cups of any variety of cooked rice Steams meat and vegetables while rice cooks below Simple, one-touch operation with automatic keep-warm Great for soups, jambalaya, chili and so much more Includes full-view tempered glass lid, steam tray, rice measuring cup and serving spatula Perfectly prepares 2 to 6 cups of any variety of cooked rice Steams meat and vegetables while rice cooks below
product_description: Enjoy easy home cooking with the aroma 6-cup (cooked) pot style rice cooker and food steamer. Restaurant-quality rice. Healthy steamed meals. Delicious one-pot dishes. Prepare all this and more at the flip of a switch! Aroma takes the "cook" out of home cooking - turning kitchen time into your time! Help the kids with homework, get creative at play time or pick up that novel you've been waiting to dive into. All while delivering hot, hearty and healthy meals the entire family will love. This convenient cooker's compact capacity perfectly cooks 2 to 6 cups of any variety of rice. Once the rice has finished, it will automatically switch to keep-warm so there's no need for monitoring or stirring. The steam tray allows for healthy steaming of meats and vegetables, even as rice cooks below. It's also perfect for oatmeal, chili, jambalaya, soups and so much more! And when the cooking is done, the inner cooking pot and all accessories remove for easy cleanup in the dishwasher. Steam tray, rice measuring cup and serving spatula included.

name: High Quality Sticky Rice Steamer Basket and Lid, Woven Bamboo
short_description: Handcrafted Design: This sticky rice steamer basket and lid are expertly woven from natural bamboo strips into an intricate chevron pattern. Versatile Use: Perfect for steaming rice, vegetables, dumplings, and more. The conical shape allows steam to circulate evenly. Durable Construction: Made from high-quality bamboo known for its strength and longevity. Built to withstand regular use. Easy to Clean: The smooth bamboo surface is easy to wipe down and maintain after each use. Traditional Craftsmanship: Showcasing the timeless art of bamboo weaving, this steamer basket adds a touch of cultural charm to your kitchen.
product_description: This high-quality sticky rice steamer basket and lid is a traditional and versatile kitchen tool. Handcrafted from natural materials, the intricate weave pattern showcases exceptional craftsmanship. The sturdy construction allows for effortless steaming of rice, dumplings, and various delicacies. The conical shape with a domed lid ensures even heat distribution, while the handle offers a secure grip. This steamer basket adds an authentic touch to your culinary adventures, allowing you to prepare flavorful and perfectly cooked dishes with ease. Suitable for use on the stovetop or in a steamer pot, it's a must-have for anyone who appreciates the art of steaming. Dimensions: 10 inches in diameter, 8 inches in height.
